Summary: birdlike features. motion, velocity not animal like.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dumfries
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details on saturday around 6:15 pm i was on my deck chilling out, i happened to look up in the sky. i saw seagulls and airplanes flying above. i looked again and noticed objects flying not in any formation like the birds; i look again and noticed they are pretty high. higher than the birds and lower than the planes. i said, omg!! ufos. they stand apart from the birds and planes. i freaked out because they were several flying in scattered groups and making turns unlike birds or planes and no noise like birds. i ran inside and needed a witness, so i yelled to my wife you have to come outside now!! so she a total non-believer of stuff like this, until she saw what i saw and also to confirmed i was not going crazy. i took several pictures and videos with my little digital and note. unfortunately only one came out recognizable. the others were totally blank; it was like i was taking pictures of the blue sky. i found that was strange too. i did report the sighting to a reporting agency. i am waiting to hear back on the photo taken, it was not a hoax, birds or plane. these objects exist and something is definitely going on outside our reach. sunday, i look and notices just birds and planes flying above, i tried so hard not to believe what i saw but the truth is in the photo and i also research the internet, found exactly what i saw. somebody else video ufos somewhere in the mexico. these objects move and were shape identical to what i saw. this confirms my notion what they really were. "ufos" my first encounter!!! please look at the attached photo, not much but there. three objects. believe me there were more. i managed to find a youtube clip, this is simliar to what i saw http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=jmis7q72u1s
